name: SINKING !
description:
Sinking is a 2D game developped with Unity during our ESIEE game development course.

2 pirates are on a boat sailing, events come to jeopardize the trip, players must overcome the damage and repair the boat to arrive safely !

A game lasts around 4 minutes.

Advice : don't fall overboard ! 

CONTROLS :

Player 1 : 

  • ZQSD : Move
  • E : Use canon / place yourself to repaire
  • SPACE : Jump / shoot (when using canon) / repair (when placed on hole)

Player 2 : 

  • Directional arrows: Move
  • ENTER : Use canon / place yourself to repaire
  • 0 : Jump / shoot (when using canon) / repair (when placed on hole)

Controller not recommended 

Inspirations : 

  • Overcooked
  • Lovers in a dangerous spacetime
  • Sea of thieves
